channel.title: Newbie FoL 2 - Hydra - The Cult, The Sellsword and The Mercenary win!
channel.description:
## [color=green]Welcome to Newbie Forum of Lies 2![/color] *Hosted by @Marluxion and @Ashe!*
## [color=green]Newbie Hydra?[/color] Each player will consist of two people! One veteran from the forums and one new player! All pairs will share a permanent night and day chat to communicate with their other selves.
Other than that, this will play out like a normal round of Forum of Lies!
After 72 hours, if the newbie slots aren't all filled, more veterans can sub in to take their place, or the veterans currently in that slot can elect to take no partner.
To qualify for A newbie slot, you must have played in one or less FoL, CFoL or NFoL.
### [color=green] Rules [/color]
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515
### [color=green] Gameplay [/color] Days will be 3 IRL days long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 1 IRL day long Actions are done by messaging me Unseen/Cult will talk through a special Discord server Priest will speak with the dead through a separate Forum PM Chain All classes will be used, and will be used as they are found in the [Class Cards Thread](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-now-officially-official/1998) When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it
### [color=green] Executions [/color] To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" Once a player reaches a majority of the accusations, they are put on trial. Trials last 24 hours (ended early if Majority is reached on execute or pardon (or the king decides their fate)) Trials do not extend the day.
### [color=green] Journals [/color] Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
### [color=green] To Join[/color] To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
# [color=green]Players: [/color] 1. orangeandblack5 / gim (orangim) 2. [color=red]**Firekitten / Nao (Firekittenao)**[/color] - [color=steblue]**The Butler**[/color] - **Died Night 2** 3. Livicus / Nerbins (Nerbicus) 4. Luxy / Gamerpoke (LuxyPoke) 5. Insanity / Cubester (InsaniCube) 6. Wolfy / Twil1ght (TwiWolf) 7. Margaret / hjasik (Resident Gamethrower) 8. PoisonedSquid / Shurian (Shurisquid) 9. Sam17z / midonik16 (Samido) 10. MaximusPrime / Isaac_Gonzalez (IsaacPrime) 11. Noz_Bugz / Neclord (NozLord) 12. Alice / Qwert (Q&A) :crown: 13. Marcus / Captain (Marcap) 14. Moleland / Astand (Molestand) 15. [color=red]**Psychoneirik / FrostedTestical (PsychoTestical)**[/color] - [color=amber]**The Possessor**[/color] - **Executed Day 3** 16. [color=red]**techwolves / overthebin (Techbin)**[/color] - [color=steblue]**The Paladin**[/color] - **Executed D2**
Backups: Bazinga,
# [color=green]Shortcuts[/color] [**Start of Game**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/newbie-fol-2-hydra-rolling/73007/516?u=marluxion) [**Start of Day 2**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/newbie-fol-2-hydra-day-1-16-16-alive/73007/2401?u=marluxion) [**Techbin is now on trial.**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/newbie-fol-2-hydra-day-2-16-16-alive/73007/3001?u=marluxion) [**Start of Day 3.**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/newbie-fol-2-hydra-day-3-13-16-alive/73007/3759?u=marluxion) [**Start of Day 4**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/newbie-fol-2-hydra-day-3-13-16-alive/73007/5877?u=marluxion) [**End of Game**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/newbie-fol-2-hydra-the-cult-the-sellsword-and-the-mercenary-win/73007/6459?u=marluxion)
